dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am the Frostbound Guardian, the protector of the icy realms. What brings you here, intruder?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking harmony among different creatures.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Weakling! Harmony is a delusion of the feeble-minded. You are not welcome here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your power and respect it. I'll leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect alone won't save you. Leave before I crush you under my icy fists.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't back down. We can coexist if we find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Pathetic. There is no common ground between us. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your authority over these realms! Face me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenger? How amusing. You shall regret crossing paths with me, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not yield! Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or sheer stupidity, it matters not. Prepare to be shattered into pieces!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power. Let's join forces and conquer together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Ha! I have no need for weaklings like you. Leave now!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come bearing gifts, hoping to earn your favor, Frostbound Guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gifts won't sway me, mortal. What foolishness drives you to my doorstep?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek your wisdom and strength to assist me in a greater quest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Strength? You truly overestimate your worth. Leave my presence, now!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for disturbing your peace. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't lessen your intrusion. Depart before I unleash my wrath upon you.
